Fee Schedule

Source: vignettes/fee-schedule.Rmd
fee-schedule.Rmd
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
library(qs)

Look Up HCPCS Code 

hcpcs_search(
  hcpcs = "39503", 
  state = "GA", 
  locality = "99", 
  mac = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 62
#> $ hcpcs            <chr> "39503"
#> $ cpt_section      <chr> "Surgery"

#> $ cons_desc        <chr> "Repair of congenital defect of muscle separating che…

hcpcs_search(hcpcs = "70170", 
             state = "NY", 
             locality = "01",
             mac = "13202") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 3
#> Columns: 63
#> $ hcpcs            <chr> "70170", "70170", "70170"

Physician Fee Schedule Amount Calculation


\(RVU_w\) Work Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_w\) Work Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_p\) Practice Expense Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_p\) Practice Expense Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(RVU_m\) Malpractice Relative Value Unit
\(GPCI_m\) Malpractice Geographic Practice Cost Index
\(CF\) Conversion Factor


The Participating amount is calculated as follows:



\[x = [(RVU_w \times GPCI_w) + (RVU_p \times GPCI_p) + (RVU_m \times GPCI_m)] \times CF\]


The Non-participating amount is calculated as follows:


\[ y = 0.95x\]


The Limiting charge is calculated as follows:


\[ z = 0.95(1.15x)\]


calculate_amounts(wrvu  = 6.26,
             nprvu = 7.92,
             fprvu = 4.36,
             mrvu  = 0.99,
             cf    = 32.744,
             wgpci = 1,
             pgpci = 0.883,
             mgpci = 1.125)
#> Facility:
#> Participating Amount    = $367.51
#> Non-Particpating Amount = $349.13
#> Limiting Charge         = $401.50
#> 
#> Non-Facility:
#> Participating Amount    = $470.44
#> Non-Particpating Amount = $446.91
#> Limiting Charge         = $513.95

Data Sources 

rvu(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 28
#> $ hcpcs       <chr> "11646"
#> $ description <chr> "Exc f/e/e/n/l mal+mrg >4 cm"
#> $ mod         <chr> NA
#> $ status      <chr> "A"
#> $ wrvu        <dbl> 6.26
#> $ nprvu       <dbl> 7.92
#> $ fprvu       <dbl> 4.36
#> $ mrvu        <dbl> 0.99
#> $ cf          <dbl> 32.744
#> $ nprvu_opps  <dbl> 0
#> $ fprvu_opps  <dbl> 0
#> $ mrvu_opps   <dbl> 0
#> $ global      <chr> "010"
#> $ op_ind      <dbl> 1
#> $ op_pre      <dbl> 0.1
#> $ op_intra    <dbl> 0.8
#> $ op_post     <dbl> 0.1
#> $ pctc        <chr> "0"
#> $ mult_proc   <chr> "2"
#> $ surg_bilat  <chr> "0"
#> $ surg_asst   <chr> "1"
#> $ surg_co     <chr> "0"
#> $ surg_team   <chr> "0"
#> $ endo        <chr> NA
#> $ supvis      <chr> "09"
#> $ dximg       <chr> "99"
#> $ unused      <int> 0
#> $ rare        <chr> "00"
gpci(state    = "GA",
     locality = "99",
     mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 9
#> $ mac      <chr> "10212"
#> $ state    <chr> "GA"
#> $ locality <chr> "99"
#> $ name     <chr> "REST OF GEORGIA"
#> $ wgpci    <dbl> 1
#> $ pgpci    <dbl> 0.883
#> $ mgpci    <dbl> 1.125
#> $ counties <chr> "ALL OTHER COUNTIES"
#> $ two_macs <lgl> FALSE
pfs(hcpcs    = "11646", 
    locality = "99",
    mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 14
#> $ mac       <chr> "10212"
#> $ locality  <chr> "99"
#> $ hcpcs     <chr> "11646"
#> $ mod       <chr> NA
#> $ status    <chr> "A"
#> $ mult_surg <chr> "0"
#> $ flat_vis  <dbl> 0
#> $ nther     <dbl> 2
#> $ fther     <dbl> 0
#> $ fee_nf    <dbl> 470.44
#> $ fee_f     <dbl> 367.51
#> $ opps      <chr> "9"
#> $ opps_nf   <dbl> 0
#> $ opps_f    <dbl> 0
descriptors(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  tidyr::nest(clinician_descriptors = clinician_descriptor) |> 
  glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 3
#> $ cpt                   <chr> "11646"
#> $ consumer_descriptor   <chr> "Removal of cancer skin growth of face, ears, ey…
#> $ clinician_descriptors <list> [<tbl_df[10 x 1]>]
